how-food-waste-affects-the-climate.title: How Food Waste Affects The Climate
how-food-waste-affects-the-climate.author: Gabee De Vera
how-food-waste-affects-the-climate.description: When you hear the phrase climate change, what do you think of? Greenhouse gases? Fossil fuels? Many people think of these as the primary causes of climate change, and they would be right! However, there is one cause of climate change that I think most people are not aware of, and that cause is Food Waste.
